title: Bobby on 20th Anniversary of 9/11 + Darryl Worley Performs + Shares Story Behind "Have You Forgotten?"  + Top Songs That Are Now Considered ‘Classics’
itunes:title: Bobby on 20th Anniversary of 9/11 + Darryl Worley Performs + Shares Story Behind "Have You Forgotten?"  + Top Songs That Are Now Considered ‘Classics’
description:
Bobby and the show start by sharing their memories from 9/11 and reflect on the 20 year anniversary. Darrly Worley stops by to perform his song that was inspired by 9/11 and he shares the story behind it. Bobby has a list of songs that are now considered classics which makes us all feel old.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
